description:
I have a  devstack installation. 'nova-manage drive list'  and 'nova-manage help drive'  cmds are failing


deepak@deepak-app:/opt/stack/quantum/etc$ nova-manage drive list
2012-03-19 16:12:30 CRITICAL nova [req-6e817710-6282-41f9-b4fa-7d5dcecfc30e None None] 'bool' object has no attribute 'decode'
(nova): TRACE: Traceback (most recent call last):
(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/local/bin/nova-manage", line 7, in <module>
(nova): TRACE:     execfile(__file__)
(nova): TRACE:   File "/opt/stack/nova/bin/nova-manage", line 2207, in <module>
(nova): TRACE:     main()
(nova): TRACE:   File "/opt/stack/nova/bin/nova-manage", line 2188, in main
(nova): TRACE:     fn_kwargs[k] = v.decode('utf-8')
(nova): TRACE: AttributeError: 'bool' object has no attribute 'decode'
(nova): TRACE: 
deepak@deepak-app:/opt/stack/quantum/etc$ nova-manage help drive
help does not match any options:
	account
	agent
	config
	db
	drive
	export
	fixed
	flavor
	floating
	host
	instance_type
	network
	project
	role
	service
	shell
	sm
	user
	version
	vm
	volume
	vpn
	vsa
	logs
title: 'nova-manage drive'  cmd errors
